title: My old account
body: Riot I haven't been able to get in my old account --snopp-- and I don't know if it's been banned or not so can you help me by telling me if it's banned and if it's not can you give me the email?

replies.body: Are you aloud to tell me my account info

I've edited your personal info for security reasons.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will look into this with you and offer more context.  We'll see you there!
Was someone getting into my account is that why you changed them?? Because sometimes I got kicked off while in the shop.

I changed them because it's not secure to share your username or personal information through a public venue.  If you feel like someone could be accessing your account or just want some extra safety practices, our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide can assist.  I hope that helps!
I mean I don't have my account stuff yet so the security won't help right now but thanks for the help
Was someone getting into my account is that why you changed them?? Because sometimes I got kicked off while in the shop.
